His administration has pursued an aggressive military posture, launching operations in Venezuela and threatening other nations, while Trump also expressed a desire for US "ownership" of Greenland.

title: Meerut horror: Mother killed while shielding daughter from abductors
description: A 50-year-old woman in Meerut died after being struck with a weapon while trying to protect her daughter from abductors. The attackers forcibly attempted to take the daughter, and when the mother intervened, she was fatally injured. Police have registered a murder and abduction case and formed teams to apprehend the suspects.

title: 'Shoot first, ask questions later': Denmark's warning to Trump; tensions soar over Greenland
description: Denmark has warned its troops are under standing orders to "shoot first and ask questions later" if Greenland is attacked, as Europe grows anxious over potential US military action. The US is reportedly considering cash payments to Greenlanders to encourage independence from Denmark, a move European leaders are rallying against.

description: Bangladesh Cricket Board has formally requested the ICC to shift their T20 World Cup matches from India to Sri Lanka due to security concerns. description: A devastating garbage avalanche at a Cebu City waste facility tragically claimed one life and left many missing.  Twelve workers were rescued alive from the collapsed debris, but fears remain for at least 38 others believed trapped.  Search and rescue operations are ongoing, with authorities prioritizing aid for affected families.

The showers, accompanied by cold winds, lowered the chill factor, with minimum temperatures expected around 6°C. Dense fog is also anticipated, with cold-day conditions likely to persist across northern and central regions.

title: Fresh row in Indore: Collector, mayor attend meeting in RSS office

description: Since 1991, the fact that pre-conceptional intake of folic acid by women can prevent more than 70% of Spina Bifida cases has been known. Yet, 30 years later, India is one of the few countries where no meaningful efforts to create awareness about this intervention have been carried out, making it home to one of the highest prevalence rates of this condition in the world

Local leaders disputed the federal account, with the mayor calling for ICE to leave the city.

title: Anti-Khamenei protests rage on: Iran govt shuts internet; Trump warns to 'hit very hard'
description: Iran has imposed severe communication restrictions, including internet and phone shutdowns, amidst escalating protests against economic hardship. Exiled crown prince Reza Pahlavi condemned the government's actions, urging international intervention. Meanwhile, US President Trump issued a stern warning against violent crackdowns, while US officials voiced support for peaceful demonstrators. The unrest, fueled by currency collapse and inflation, has spread nationwide.

title: 'Stay hungry, stay foolish': Jobs urged students to trust intuition; speech shaped Mac design
description: Steve Jobs, a renowned tech entrepreneur, shared his decision to drop out of college, highlighting its unexpected benefits. He emphasized the importance of following one's curiosity and intuition, as this led him to discover calligraphy, a skill that later profoundly influenced the design of the Macintosh computer and personal computers in general.

title: Candace Owens questions Charlie Kirk after sharing unseen image with no blood
description: Candace Owens shared claims about a photo she says shows Charlie Kirk after an alleged shooting. She questioned the official story and named people she said could not be trusted. However, there is no verified evidence, police record, or official confirmation that Charlie Kirk was shot or killed. Her statements remain unproven and widely disputed.

title: Tommy Fleetwood & Clare Fleetwood net worth: Golf earnings, sponsors, family

Clare, as his manager, plays a crucial role in their financial success and their private family life. Their collaborative approach has led to both on-course achievements and long-term financial stability.
